caption.title: Changes in the oxidation stability of animal skin (duck, chicken, swine, and bovine) fats during storage at 60Â°C for 90 days.
caption.p: (A) The acid value (AV), (B) peroxide value (PV), (C) p<-anisidine value ( p<-AV), (D) thiobarbituric acid reactive substances (TBARS), (E) conjugated dienes (CD), and (F) total oxidation (totox) value in animal skin fats were determined. The error bars indicate standard deviations.
